desc.trowels.trowel: When right-clicked, the trowel will place a random item from your hotbar.
desc.trowels.trowel.destroy_recent: When clicking a block that has been recently (last 5 blocks) placed by the trowel, you can mine it with it.
trowel_upgrade.refill.desc: Combine with a Trowel in an anvil in order to make it refill the slot of the used block after placement, from your inventory.
